DocAttribute.Name: Item
Styles
DocAttribute.Documentation:
Representation styles which are assigned, either to an geometric representation item, or to a material definition. { .change-ifc2x4} > IFC4 CHANGE The data type has been changed to _IfcStyleAssignmentSelect_ with upward compatibility for file based exchange.
> NOTE  Only the select item _IfcPresentationStyle_ shall be used from IFC4 onwards, the _IfcPresentationStyleAssignment_ has been deprecated.

DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: The word, or group of words, by which the styled item is referred to.

DocWhereRule.Name: ApplicableItem
DocWhereRule.Documentation: A styled item cannot be styled by another styled item.
